data.title: CATERING
data.meta_description:
Catering to
every need. At the Trusts Arena we pride ourselves on the impeccably high standard of our cuisine, along with the healthy components we offer throughout our menu’s. We source all of our ingredients through local suppliers, ensuring they are fresh and sustainable all year round. Our
data.text:
At the Trusts Arena we pride ourselves on the impeccably high standard of our cuisine, along with the healthy components we offer throughout our menu’s. We source all of our ingredients through local suppliers, ensuring they are fresh and sustainable all year round. Our chefs work tirelessly to create unique menus ranging from breakfast to dinner, and can tailor for all tastes, absolutely anything is possible.

With our catering based in house, menu design and procurement are done internally therefore any savings are passed directly to our clients. When it comes to larger catered events, we would encourage you to have an in-depth conversation and description of the dishes selected to ensure you are completely happy with your final menu.

Catering capacity from 10 to 3,000.
